specific_question: What percentage of our current EV battery design features AI-enhanced battery management for our North American market, as of Q2 2024?
answer: 35% of our current EV battery design features AI-enhanced battery management for our North American market as of Q2 2024.
justification: This information will help us identify the scope of AI-enhanced battery management in our current fleet and its potential for improvement.
dr_question: Can we leverage AI-enhanced battery management to improve EV battery lifespan by 15%?
